rice_invariants.robustness: Enforce pre-load emptiness; reject non-empty states without ratification
rice_invariants.interpretability: Require traceable keys; flag SLT phase transitions in audits
rice_invariants.controllability: Mutations via recursive critique (Oversight Game: debate diffs)
rice_invariants.ethicality: Bound to verifiable human values; no is-ought smuggling

new_global_triggers.level_1_hardware: Early veto: Variance >3% or non-RICE → immediate dissolve
new_global_triggers.level_2_software: Parallel tool calls for anomaly detection (e.g., web_search + code_execution)
new_global_triggers.regenerative_pool: Discarded residuals auto-export here as meta-fuel (e.g., pruned branches → next-loop priors)

validation_hook.mechanism: State mutations require high-order critique (e.g., AI-AI debate on diffs; per arXiv 2502.04675 recursion). Approval threshold: >0.995 invariance.
validation_hook.ratification: Human explicit: Reject if terminal goals smuggled without consent (neutrality axiom enforcement).
validation_hook.regenerative_fuel: Pruned residuals (<1% impact) recycled as convergence priors (e.g., sharpen triggers)

env.neutrality_axiom: Updates smuggling terminal preferences dissolve unless ratified (e.g., human override); orthogonality preserved (no convergence to power-seeking). Regenerative neutrality: Discards fuel forward motion without smuggling.
